attributes.action: Raise a vote of No confidence in current government
attributes.additional_details: The decisions the incumbent government are making do not reflect the will of the British people and electoral pledges made to secure victory have been ignored. The British people are tired of Politicians ignoring the native people of Britain’s fears and needs in favour of foreign funding and support
attributes.background: Raise a Vote of No Confidence in the current government

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
